Document title: LinkedIn title (58 characters lenght). Only for LinkedIn documents (not image/video)
Video Thumbnail Url: Video Thumbnail Url (Facebook posts and reels, Instagram reels, LinkedIn posts, TikTok business and YouTube video)
Video Cover Frame: Video Cover Frame (Instagram reels, Pinterest and TikTok)
Twitter/X Can reply: following, mentionedUsers, subscribers or verified (When it´s empty everyone can reply)
Twitter/X Poll Duration minutes: (When Twitter/X Type POLL) Duration in minutes. It cannot exceed 10080 minutes
Twitter/X Poll Option 1: (When Twitter/X Type POLL) Option 1 is mandatory. It cannot exceed 25 characters.
Twitter/X Poll Option 2: (When Twitter/X Type POLL) Option 2 is mandatory. It cannot exceed 25 characters.
Twitter/X Poll Option 3: (When Twitter/X Type POLL) Option 3 is not mandatory. It cannot exceed 25 characters
Twitter/X Poll Option 4: (When Twitter/X Type POLL) Option 4 is not mandatory. It cannot exceed 25 characters
Instagram Show Reel On Feed: Enable this option (true) to include reel in your feed
Youtube Video Title: Youtube Video Title (100 characters length). For shorts and videos
Youtube Video Category: FILM_ANIMATION, AUTOS_VEHICLES, MUSIC, PETS_ANIMALS, SPORTS, TRAVEL_EVENTS, GAMING, PEOPLE_BLOGS, COMEDY, ENTERTAINMENT, NEWS_POLITICS, HOWTO_STYLE, EDUCATION, SCIENCE_TECHNOLOGY or NONPROFITS_ACTIVISM
Facebook Title: Facebook Title. Only for Facebook video posts and reels (no stories)
TikTok Title: TikTok Title (90 characters length). Only for TikTok images (no videos)
LinkedIn Poll Question: (When LinkedIn Type POLL) Question is mandatory. It cannot exceed 140 characters.
LinkedIn Poll Option 1: (When LinkedIn Type POLL) Option 1 is mandatory. It cannot exceed 30 characters.
LinkedIn Poll Option 2: (When LinkedIn Type POLL). Option 2 is mandatory. It cannot exceed 30 characters.
LinkedIn Poll Option 3: (When LinkedIn Type POLL). Option 3 is not mandatory. It cannot exceed 30 characters
LinkedIn Poll Option 4: (When LinkedIn Type POLL). Option 4 is not mandatory. It cannot exceed 30 characters
LinkedIn Poll Duration: (When LinkedIn Type POLL). ONE_DAY, THREE_DAYS, SEVEN_DAYS or FOURTEEN_DAYS
LinkedIn Show link preview: Enable this option to display a preview of the last link in your post. It only works if there is at least one link and a maximum of one image.
LinkedIn Images as Carousel: We will publish a PDF document with your images to be displayed as a carousel instead of a gallery on LinkedIn
Brand name: (Optional) Exact brand’s name where you want to schedule the post
